home.title: AWS Special Force Portal
home.des: In todayâ€™s dynamic tech landscape, cloud expertise is essential. The AWS Special Force Portal for AWS Partners keeps you ahead in cloud innovation, offering resources for ongoing learning and skill development in AWS. Whether aiming for certification, preparing AWS services for production, or exploring the latest in cloud tech, this portal offers a structured, customizable learning path. Covering domains like compute, storage, machine learning, and DevOps, the portal simplifies complex AWS topics, building knowledge step-by-step to help you tackle real-world challenges and design scalable solutions confidently.

highlight.title: Continuous update courses
highlight.desc: New courses and content added and updated all the time.

highlight.desc: Test your knowledge with interactive quiz after theory lessons.

highlight.title: Certification of completion
highlight.desc: Receive a certification once complete a course.
